S.FORM: = Ghana = Gaga kska Meycow ka Ghana, 8 00 N, 2 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 238,533 sq km(hangan na o Tg82)(knlbanga dxgal o 227,533 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 11,000 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 26,908,262 hiyi. Gaga Accra ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 6 idas 3 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Ghana ga wada sugan 69.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 21.20% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 9.70% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Nana Akufo-Addo, pnaah hngkawas2017 idas 1 jiyax 7pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Cha-na = Chana konghoko(eygo: Ghana mbah ang i/'ɡɑːnə/) ngalan dha Chana, koka wa mniq tuiril Ahuyrika, Akora ka sotu. Chana u tuiril ka syangya hayan, tudaya u msdalih Pucinahwaso, tunarac ka Toko, tuhunac ka Cineyyawan. Hangan koka Ha pa "Republic of Ghana", lxanan lmawa "Ghana". Hangan kari Telu u, Cyoka minkoku tmhangan Cyana konghokwo, lxanan lmawa "Cyana"; Cyokoku, Maraysiya mi Sincyapo tmhangan wa "Cyana konghokwo", lxanan lmawa "Cyana". Ri-s Kndadax tu3 dhuq tu4 seyki prading, nCyana tikwo ka dhiya han; tu13 seyki cida, sediq Akun, sediq Mosi mi knama mi tnhiti mniq tuhunac mi tudaya knkingal nniqan phiyu wangkwo; kngkawas 1471 cida u Budoyaka miyah knrmux qmlahang, umluk king; knnngahu ucilung pa ngalan dha "Hwangcin hayan". Kngkawas 1595 cida, Horan, Ingkoku ka mniyah kmnrmux, mppbari quri quli Kngkawas 1844 mklelu siyaw ucilung pa wada ulkun Ingkoku, kngkawas 1901 cida kana dxral dha pa wada mudxral qnlhangan Ingkoku, thnganan dha "Ingsu Hwangcin Hayan". Kngkawas 1595 cida, Horan, Ingkoku ka mniyah kmnrmux, mppbari quri quli. Kngkawas 1844 mklelu siyaw ucilung pa wada ulkun Ingkoku, kngkawas 1901 cida kana dxral dha pa wada mudxral qnlhangan Ingkoku, thnganan dha "Ingsu Hwangcin Hayan". Chana u kngkawas 1957 idas 3 diyax 6 cida ka pusa kari dukuricu, kndadax Ingkoku cuminti "Ingsu Hwangcin Hayan" mi babaw Tumntxan mccbuu daw dmuwi pneyyah Doyicu "Ingsu Toko" msupu phiyu koka, wada mAhuyrika ckcka Ingsu cuminti u muwaya bay dukuricu koka. Muwaya bay tutaxa congri Unkoruma pa kngkawas 1960 cida u wada na plixun ka bukung Ingkoku rmilih cyuncu risyeyncu, kiya mi hangan koka u kndadax Chana cucuring pryuxun hangan Chana konghoko, kiya mi wada phyuwan muwaya bay txtaxa soto. Unkoruma ka hwanhuy cuyi pusu bay mndudul niya, wada spruwan bay qmita Mawcotong uri, quri so dmudul hwanhuy dukuricu mi pnspuwan pa wada niqan bay ririh pa wada niqan bay ririh 1966 cida u wada dha spoxun muda cngpyeyn ka hiya daw, mnnuda smpusal cngpyeyn ka Chana. Kngkawas 1981 cida wada plixun ka keyngpo, kiya mi hmtur pssli cngtang. Kngkawas 1992 cida ka phiyu burah keyngpo, mntxan dungan smruwa ou tangcu. Hbaraw bay pucu u ida mniq kndusan "uka koka syakay" niya na. Niqan duma ka sediq Chana u niqan nanaq ka snolan dha kari, kiya ka taxa wada uka balay bay biyax niqan nanaq ka snolan dha kari, kiya ka taxa wada uka balay bay biyax Asanti tuwang (ngalan dha "Honey" lmawa, Asantehene), snhiyun dh aka jeynseykay pa wana "Asanti minjoku cuyi", uka ka "Chana mijoku cuyi". Asanti u wa mniq Chana tuckcka hunac, ida bay ntuiril Ahuyrika beyhing koka han, wa mniq Kumasi ka sotu, mnuda dmayaw sediq damay sbuway dha qalux sediq mquli. Hiti daw wada ngalan cuminti Ingkoku, kndudul mquri tudaya knrmux Asanti, kiya ka wada mhnyuwan Chana saya. So niyi ndanan dha Ingkoku pa knciyuk balay ka sediq Asanti, Asanti tuwang u wada lwaqun kngkawas 1902 uri da, binaw quri so nniqan Chana u knrinah naqah bay qlhangun, kiya mi sediq Ingkoku u mniq kngkawas 1924 cida mqaras snturung tuwang miyah koka dha dungan, kngkawas 1938 da u mnuda "Psdhu Asanti tbrinah phiyu koka", tbrnahun ka "Asanti cyocang kaygi" mntna so dhiya nanaq ka mqlahang. Smatang mniq iyax babaw Tumndha Smatang mniq iyax babaw Tumndha cida, snpusal dmudu Chana muda mquri icil dukuricu ini pndungus, binaw Asanti tuwang ana beytaq saya pa mniq Chana u spruwan dha balay qmita. Asanti wangwey u pnburux nanaq lmutuc dhuq dhuq saya. Tuwang saya u Awtonghuwo Nana Awsay Tutu 2su pnhyuwan kngkawas 1999, mnuyas Amirika mptkarac pnyasan na, wada dha splawa"syeyntay Soromong wang" Ti-ri Pusu bay beyhing alang mkbrnux Chana Mklucilung mi Mklyayung Woarta ka brnux, dxral mkpngerah, haypin twosaco, langu qsiya mhrinas; tuiril hunac mi tudaya u brunux lmiqu, tunarac hunac mi tuckcka u niqan ddwiyaq, haypa 600 dhuq 700 meyta. Msdalih bay cutaw ka Chana, balay bay karac tumtilux. Ida bay so karac tumtilux sspriq, kngkawas qyuxan qsiya u 800 dhuq 1200 hawmi; tuiril hunac u quri so karac tumtilux quyux, kngkawas qnyuxan qsiya u 1200 dhuq 2200 hawmi. Tuhunac u niqan ddha iyax qnyuxan, idas 5 dhuq idas 6, mi idas 8 dhuq idas 9. Mniq tudaya pa, ddha iyax qnyuxan niyi u wada mkingal pnslutuc. Idas 1 dhuq idas 2 cida ka msbwihur kndngu bay tunarac daya bwihur. Tunarac hunac Chana psliyan qsiya Woarto ka kana jeynseykay knbeyhing bay langu qsiya knriyan sediq, kndadax alng beyhing Yapei dhuq Akosombo tapa, 520 kongri ka knbaraw niya. Langu qsiya niyi saya pa, pusu bay sduwi phuru deyngki mi hhaqun qqiya neyru, malu ddiyun quri pnhumami qpahun qqcurux Cng-c Chana u wa tumal kcka Taing kosyey. Koka yeynso mi mpdudul seyhu uspuda seyngkyo phiyu soto, niqan biyax singcng. Gikay u wana kingal ying, pnsliyan quri ddha pusu bay tang: Sinayko tang mi Cweynko mincu tahuy tang. Sing-cng cyu-hwa Chana singcng cyuhwa u kndadax kngkawas 2019 ici ka 16 beyhing alang, dhaci Ka 216 cyu: Asanti beyhing alang(Sohu Kumasi) Purang ahahu beyhing alang (Sohu Suniyani) Tuckcka beyhing alang (Sohu Hayancyaw) Tunarac beyhing alang (Sohu Kohurituya) Taakora beyhing alang (Sohu Akora) Tudaya beyhing alang (Sohu Tamari) Tunarac daya(Sohu Poarcyatancya) Tuiril daya beyhing alang (Sohu Wacng) Woarto beyhing alang (Sohu Hwocng) Tuiril beyhing alang (Sohu Saykangti-Takorati) Cing-ci Chana haycyun cicyangting Niqan mttuku bay ida nkiya cuyeyn ka Chana, pdkanan txtaxa hiyi sediq u mntna so ddha hnruwan tuiril Ahuyrika mqrinuc balay koka ka qnrinuc dha. Ana so kiya u, ida sntama quri mawyi mi dnyawan quri ddha pusu bay tang: ddha pusu bay tang: Cweynko mincu tahuy tang. Cing-ci Chana haycyun cicyangting Niqan mttuku bay ida nkiya cuyeyn ka Chana, pdkanan txtaxa hiyi sediq u mntna so ddha hnruwan tuiril Ahuyrika mqrinuc balay koka ka qnrinuc dha. Ana so kiya u, ida sntama quri mawyi mi dnyawan quri kwoci, kiya mi sediq Chana wa mniq nganguc ka tocu nanaq koka dha. Ya bay 28% knhbrawan sediq Chana u wa mniq kwoci mqrinuc seyng truma ka kndusan dha, sntkuwan dha kingal diyax u ya bay 1.25 pila Amirika. Kiya mi pneyyah seykay inghang ka pnpatas u, Chana pa mniq 45 kngkawas u nngalan dha kngkawas pa wana mrana kkingal balay. mrana kkingal balay. Mniq cumin jidayi ka Chana u, quri so king hnruwan dha ka niqan bay hhangan, so saya daw ida pusu bay kana seykay hnruwan king koka ka Chana (Ahuyrika tudha beyhing bay hnruwan king koka). Quri so cuko canpin pa kiya kana koko, qhuni, ddeyngki, cwansu, pantu mi mong, kiya ka pusu bay pnyahan wayhuy Chana. Kngkawas 2007 u niqan kingal pnpatas pkla kari snkuwan dlih 30 oku tnqriyan gasoring (480000 rihwang cyeynmi) ka cingcuyo qnpahan gasoring u wada sndalan mniq Chana. Prading muda kmari gasoring, kndudul mrana uri ka snliyan gasoring. Akosombo tapa u, pnhiyu kngkawas 1965 mniq yayung Wota, kiya ka ddiyun deyngki Chana mi sbuway deyngki ssiyaw koka. Chana seyhu pa pusu bay nongcanpin cuko u so ka quri yawkwo, koko, sukay kuras mi trabus mi cyeynkwo, kiya mi sosweyin so niyi insn canpin mi king. Quri so uuda cuko u Chana koka nongyey cuko kwanricyu qmlahang, pumen niyi u Antoinette Efua-Addo ka mpdudul. Seyhu Chana u phiyu pnsliyan nongyey cuko niyi u so tqlahang dha ini puda waya seyhu pbarika king, sosweyin mi koko kiya mi wada kndudul mrana ka keyjay Chana. Kngkawas 2008 ka rawtongri Chana u 1150 knbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq. Keyjay u ida sntama nongyey ka pusu, cancu dha u quri so GDP 37.3% kiya mi knkana rawtori 56% mpqpah niya, mpqpah nongyey na sediq pa pusu bay quri so dmuwi ttikuh dxral ka pusu na. Keyjay Chana quri so qpahun ssmalu pa ttikuh balay nngalan dha kiya, kngkawas 2007 kana nngalan dha GDP u 7.9% balay. Cbiyaw u ini tduwa ka qmnpah dha keyjay cngco cyunsu seyhu, kiya mi ini pndungus pawcu cyuyu hoping ka pnusa dha kari, kiya ka ida nanaq so kiya tura tonghwo pngcang, ini ttuku ka ddiyun hbangan, mlih ka hbangan Chana sayti, kiya mi dsediq u krinah mrana ka ini qqaras quri ini ttuku hbangan mi pnwaya dha cngco. Ana so kiya, ida so quri knkana Ahuyrica keyjay cyeyko so mndungus hari na koka. Kngkawas 2007 idas 7 cida, Chana inhang u prading muda snburah smmalu dduwi pila ka tlmayun muda, kadadax sayti knpriyux burah ddiyun pila: Chana sayti. Ppryulan ryu u 1 Chana sayti pa malu pryuxun ncuxal 1 knbkiyan sayti. Chana inhang u dmuwi pkbiyax meycye musa tmsa sediq quri snburah smmalu dduwi pila, pkla so malu ka psnakan pila krtan mi pila klabuy. Burah Chana sayti pa mdhu balay kiya. Kngkawas 2019 cida msupu pila Amirika huyryu u wa mniq 5.52:1. Cngcuswey mniq Chana u ngalun dmuwi hbangan mangal kiya. Pnwaya ngengalun jeyking u mniq kngkawas 1998 nhana phiyu cida pa pskingal bay huyryu niya na, dhuq kngkawas 2007 idas 9 cida daw wada muda ou kluwanan huyryu da. Mniq kngkawas 1998 pa, sweyryu u 10% , dhuq kngkawas 2000 cida da u wada prnaun beytaq 12.5% da. Binaw spuda wada pdan kngkawas 2007 ka tu734 pnlawa hwaan, 3% ka cngcu tongyi swey bnkuwan ddaun u prading spuda skkingal mi peysong hangyey muda. So niyi daw srwanun ka ringsosang u mniq sbari tu546 pnlawa hwaan ka ingcngswey sangpin cida, malu mangal 3% peynci jeyking cngpn, mniq pkrana jeyking huwu kluwan uri u malu muru 3% ka piri pkla jeyking. Quri so uuda niyi pa pusu na bay u so slxan ka sweywu sitong mi pskbiyax sweywu sitong ringhwosing. Nongyeykwo niya na ka Chana, kana koka u niqan 60% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka mpqpah pnwalang, cucan 40% ka komin sngcan congcu. Chana pa kana jeynseykay knbeyki bay koka tbrinah mangal syawjuy tyeyncu canpin, mpkturu so koka icil ka tbrnahan mangal snliqan na babaw dxral. Chana saya pa knou bay knriyan dha mnangal king u hmrinas 20 seyki 90 kngkawas pnrdingan na mpkrima.

= Ghana = Gaga kska Meycow ka Ghana, 8 00 N, 2 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 238,533 sq km(hangan na o Tg82)(knlbanga dxgal o 227,533 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 11,000 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 26,908,262 hiyi. Gaga Accra ka poso alang paro, jiyax 6 idas 3 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Ghana ga wada sogan 69.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 21.20% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 9.70% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Nana Akofo-Addo, pnaah hngkawas2017 idas 1 jiyax 7pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Cha-na = Chana konghoko(eygo: Ghana mbah ang i/'ɡɑːnə/) ngalan dha Chana, koka wa mniq toiril Ahoyrika, Akora ka soto. Chana o toiril ka syangya hayan, todaya o msdalih Pocinahwaso, tonarac ka Toko, tohonac ka Cineyyawan. Hangan koka Ha pa "Repoblic of Ghana", lxanan lmawa "Ghana". Hangan kari Telo o, Cyoka minkoko tmhangan Cyana konghokwo, lxanan lmawa "Cyana"; Cyokoko, Maraysiya mi Sincyapo tmhangan wa "Cyana konghokwo", lxanan lmawa "Cyana". Ri-s Kndadax to3 dhoq to4 seyki prading, nCyana tikwo ka dhiya han; to13 seyki cida, sediq Akon, sediq Mosi mi knama mi tnhiti mniq tohonac mi todaya knkingal nniqan phiyo wangkwo; kngkawas 1471 cida o Bodoyaka miyah knrmox qmlahang, omlok king; knnngaho ocilong pa ngalan dha "Hwangcin hayan". Kngkawas 1595 cida, Horan, Ingkoko ka mniyah kmnrmox, mppbari qori qoli Kngkawas 1844 mklelo siyaw ocilong pa wada olkon Ingkoko, kngkawas 1901 cida kana dxral dha pa wada modxral qnlhangan Ingkoko, thnganan dha "Ingso Hwangcin Hayan". Kngkawas 1595 cida, Horan, Ingkoko ka mniyah kmnrmox, mppbari qori qoli. Kngkawas 1844 mklelo siyaw ocilong pa wada olkon Ingkoko, kngkawas 1901 cida kana dxral dha pa wada modxral qnlhangan Ingkoko, thnganan dha "Ingso Hwangcin Hayan". Chana o kngkawas 1957 idas 3 diyax 6 cida ka posa kari dokorico, kndadax Ingkoko cominti "Ingso Hwangcin Hayan" mi babaw Tomntxan mccboo daw dmowi pneyyah Doyico "Ingso Toko" msopo phiyo koka, wada mAhoyrika ckcka Ingso cominti o mowaya bay dokorico koka. Mowaya bay totaxa congri Unkoroma pa kngkawas 1960 cida o wada na plixon ka bokong Ingkoko rmilih cyonco risyeynco, kiya mi hangan koka o kndadax Chana cocoring pryoxon hangan Chana konghoko, kiya mi wada phyowan mowaya bay txtaxa soto. Unkoroma ka hwanhoy coyi poso bay mndodol niya, wada sprowan bay qmita Mawcotong ori, qori so dmodol hwanhoy dokorico mi pnspowan pa wada niqan bay ririh pa wada niqan bay ririh 1966 cida o wada dha spoxon moda cngpyeyn ka hiya daw, mnnoda smposal cngpyeyn ka Chana. Kngkawas 1981 cida wada plixon ka keyngpo, kiya mi hmtor pssli cngtang. Kngkawas 1992 cida ka phiyo borah keyngpo, mntxan dongan smrowa oo tangco. Hbaraw bay poco o ida mniq kndosan "oka koka syakay" niya na. Niqan doma ka sediq Chana o niqan nanaq ka snolan dha kari, kiya ka taxa wada oka balay bay biyax niqan nanaq ka snolan dha kari, kiya ka taxa wada oka balay bay biyax Asanti towang (ngalan dha "Honey" lmawa, Asantehene), snhiyon dh aka jeynseykay pa wana "Asanti minjoko coyi", oka ka "Chana mijoko coyi". Asanti o wa mniq Chana tockcka honac, ida bay ntoiril Ahoyrika beyhing koka han, wa mniq Komasi ka soto, mnoda dmayaw sediq damay sboway dha qalox sediq mqoli. Hiti daw wada ngalan cominti Ingkoko, kndodol mqori todaya knrmox Asanti, kiya ka wada mhnyowan Chana saya. So niyi ndanan dha Ingkoko pa knciyok balay ka sediq Asanti, Asanti towang o wada lwaqon kngkawas 1902 ori da, binaw qori so nniqan Chana o knrinah naqah bay qlhangon, kiya mi sediq Ingkoko o mniq kngkawas 1924 cida mqaras sntorong towang miyah koka dha dongan, kngkawas 1938 da o mnoda "Psdho Asanti tbrinah phiyo koka", tbrnahon ka "Asanti cyocang kaygi" mntna so dhiya nanaq ka mqlahang. Smatang mniq iyax babaw Tomndha Smatang mniq iyax babaw Tomndha cida, snposal dmodo Chana moda mqori icil dokorico ini pndongos, binaw Asanti towang ana beytaq saya pa mniq Chana o sprowan dha balay qmita. Asanti wangwey o pnborox nanaq lmotoc dhoq dhoq saya. Towang saya o Awtonghowo Nana Awsay Toto 2so pnhyowan kngkawas 1999, mnoyas Amirika mptkarac pnyasan na, wada dha splawa"syeyntay Soromong wang" Ti-ri Poso bay beyhing alang mkbrnox Chana Mklocilong mi Mklyayong Woarta ka brnox, dxral mkpngerah, haypin twosaco, lango qsiya mhrinas; toiril honac mi todaya o bronox lmiqo, tonarac honac mi tockcka o niqan ddwiyaq, haypa 600 dhoq 700 meyta. Msdalih bay cotaw ka Chana, balay bay karac tomtilox. Ida bay so karac tomtilox sspriq, kngkawas qyoxan qsiya o 800 dhoq 1200 hawmi; toiril honac o qori so karac tomtilox qoyox, kngkawas qnyoxan qsiya o 1200 dhoq 2200 hawmi. Tohonac o niqan ddha iyax qnyoxan, idas 5 dhoq idas 6, mi idas 8 dhoq idas 9. Mniq todaya pa, ddha iyax qnyoxan niyi o wada mkingal pnslotoc. Idas 1 dhoq idas 2 cida ka msbwihor kndngo bay tonarac daya bwihor. Tonarac honac Chana psliyan qsiya Woarto ka kana jeynseykay knbeyhing bay lango qsiya knriyan sediq, kndadax alng beyhing Yapei dhoq Akosombo tapa, 520 kongri ka knbaraw niya. Lango qsiya niyi saya pa, poso bay sdowi phoro deyngki mi hhaqon qqiya neyro, malo ddiyon qori pnhomami qpahon qqcorox Cng-c Chana o wa tomal kcka Taing kosyey. Koka yeynso mi mpdodol seyho ospoda seyngkyo phiyo soto, niqan biyax singcng. Gikay o wana kingal ying, pnsliyan qori ddha poso bay tang: Sinayko tang mi Cweynko minco tahoy tang. Sing-cng cyo-hwa Chana singcng cyohwa o kndadax kngkawas 2019 ici ka 16 beyhing alang, dhaci Ka 216 cyo: Asanti beyhing alang(Soho Komasi) Porang ahaho beyhing alang (Soho Soniyani) Tockcka beyhing alang (Soho Hayancyaw) Tonarac beyhing alang (Soho Kohoritoya) Taakora beyhing alang (Soho Akora) Todaya beyhing alang (Soho Tamari) Tonarac daya(Soho Poarcyatancya) Toiril daya beyhing alang (Soho Wacng) Woarto beyhing alang (Soho Hwocng) Toiril beyhing alang (Soho Saykangti-Takorati) Cing-ci Chana haycyon cicyangting Niqan mttoko bay ida nkiya coyeyn ka Chana, pdkanan txtaxa hiyi sediq o mntna so ddha hnrowan toiril Ahoyrika mqrinoc balay koka ka qnrinoc dha. Ana so kiya o, ida sntama qori mawyi mi dnyawan qori ddha poso bay tang: ddha poso bay tang: Cweynko minco tahoy tang. Cing-ci Chana haycyon cicyangting Niqan mttoko bay ida nkiya coyeyn ka Chana, pdkanan txtaxa hiyi sediq o mntna so ddha hnrowan toiril Ahoyrika mqrinoc balay koka ka qnrinoc dha. Ana so kiya o, ida sntama qori mawyi mi dnyawan qori kwoci, kiya mi sediq Chana wa mniq ngangoc ka toco nanaq koka dha. Ya bay 28% knhbrawan sediq Chana o wa mniq kwoci mqrinoc seyng troma ka kndosan dha, sntkowan dha kingal diyax o ya bay 1.25 pila Amirika. Kiya mi pneyyah seykay inghang ka pnpatas o, Chana pa mniq 45 kngkawas o nngalan dha kngkawas pa wana mrana kkingal balay. mrana kkingal balay. Mniq comin jidayi ka Chana o, qori so king hnrowan dha ka niqan bay hhangan, so saya daw ida poso bay kana seykay hnrowan king koka ka Chana (Ahoyrika todha beyhing bay hnrowan king koka). Qori so coko canpin pa kiya kana koko, qhoni, ddeyngki, cwanso, panto mi mong, kiya ka poso bay pnyahan wayhoy Chana. Kngkawas 2007 o niqan kingal pnpatas pkla kari snkowan dlih 30 oko tnqriyan gasoring (480000 rihwang cyeynmi) ka cingcoyo qnpahan gasoring o wada sndalan mniq Chana. Prading moda kmari gasoring, kndodol mrana ori ka snliyan gasoring. Akosombo tapa o, pnhiyo kngkawas 1965 mniq yayong Wota, kiya ka ddiyon deyngki Chana mi sboway deyngki ssiyaw koka. Chana seyho pa poso bay nongcanpin coko o so ka qori yawkwo, koko, sokay koras mi trabos mi cyeynkwo, kiya mi sosweyin so niyi insn canpin mi king. Qori so ooda coko o Chana koka nongyey coko kwanricyo qmlahang, pomen niyi o Antoinette Efoa-Addo ka mpdodol. Seyho Chana o phiyo pnsliyan nongyey coko niyi o so tqlahang dha ini poda waya seyho pbarika king, sosweyin mi koko kiya mi wada kndodol mrana ka keyjay Chana. Kngkawas 2008 ka rawtongri Chana o 1150 knbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq. Keyjay o ida sntama nongyey ka poso, canco dha o qori so GDP 37.3% kiya mi knkana rawtori 56% mpqpah niya, mpqpah nongyey na sediq pa poso bay qori so dmowi ttikoh dxral ka poso na. Keyjay Chana qori so qpahon ssmalo pa ttikoh balay nngalan dha kiya, kngkawas 2007 kana nngalan dha GDP o 7.9% balay. Cbiyaw o ini tdowa ka qmnpah dha keyjay cngco cyonso seyho, kiya mi ini pndongos pawco cyoyo hoping ka pnosa dha kari, kiya ka ida nanaq so kiya tora tonghwo pngcang, ini ttoko ka ddiyon hbangan, mlih ka hbangan Chana sayti, kiya mi dsediq o krinah mrana ka ini qqaras qori ini ttoko hbangan mi pnwaya dha cngco. Ana so kiya, ida so qori knkana Ahoyrica keyjay cyeyko so mndongos hari na koka. Kngkawas 2007 idas 7 cida, Chana inhang o prading moda snborah smmalo ddowi pila ka tlmayon moda, kadadax sayti knpriyox borah ddiyon pila: Chana sayti. Ppryolan ryo o 1 Chana sayti pa malo pryoxon ncoxal 1 knbkiyan sayti. Chana inhang o dmowi pkbiyax meycye mosa tmsa sediq qori snborah smmalo ddowi pila, pkla so malo ka psnakan pila krtan mi pila klaboy. Borah Chana sayti pa mdho balay kiya. Kngkawas 2019 cida msopo pila Amirika hoyryo o wa mniq 5.52:1. Cngcoswey mniq Chana o ngalon dmowi hbangan mangal kiya. Pnwaya ngengalon jeyking o mniq kngkawas 1998 nhana phiyo cida pa pskingal bay hoyryo niya na, dhoq kngkawas 2007 idas 9 cida daw wada moda oo klowanan hoyryo da. Mniq kngkawas 1998 pa, sweyryo o 10% , dhoq kngkawas 2000 cida da o wada prnaon beytaq 12.5% da. Binaw spoda wada pdan kngkawas 2007 ka to734 pnlawa hwaan, 3% ka cngco tongyi swey bnkowan ddaon o prading spoda skkingal mi peysong hangyey moda. So niyi daw srwanon ka ringsosang o mniq sbari to546 pnlawa hwaan ka ingcngswey sangpin cida, malo mangal 3% peynci jeyking cngpn, mniq pkrana jeyking howo klowan ori o malo moro 3% ka piri pkla jeyking. Qori so ooda niyi pa poso na bay o so slxan ka sweywo sitong mi pskbiyax sweywo sitong ringhwosing. Nongyeykwo niya na ka Chana, kana koka o niqan 60% knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka mpqpah pnwalang, cocan 40% ka komin sngcan congco. Chana pa kana jeynseykay knbeyki bay koka tbrinah mangal syawjoy tyeynco canpin, mpktoro so koka icil ka tbrnahan mangal snliqan na babaw dxral. Chana saya pa knoo bay knriyan dha mnangal king o hmrinas 20 seyki 90 kngkawas pnrdingan na mpkrima.
